description: Contains the values for sound sources, locations, frequencies, and thresholds documented when performing Audiogram exams.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (ID number) for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SOUND_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source the sound was generated from (Air Conduction, Mastoid Bone Conduction, etc.) during an Audiometry exam.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Air Conduction Unmasked


Air Conduction Masked


Mastoid Bone Conduction Unmasked


Mastoid Bone Conduction Masked


Forehead Bone Conduction Unmasked


Forehead Bone Conduction Masked


Sound Field


Warble Tone


Narrowband Noise


Fresh Noise


Hearing Aid


Cochlear Implant


Osseointegrated Device


Air Masking


Mastoid Bone Conduction Masking


Forehead Bone Conduction Masking

columns.name: SOUND_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The location on the patient the sound is being heard from (Left Ear, Right Ear, Unknown) during an Audiometry exam.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Right Ear


Left Ear


Unspecified Ear

columns.name: SOUND_FREQ_C_NAME
columns.description:
The frequency (in Hz) the sound was played at during an Audiometry exam.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


125Hz


250Hz


500Hz


750Hz


1000Hz


1500Hz


2000Hz


3000Hz


4000Hz


6000Hz


8000Hz


9000Hz


10000Hz


11200Hz


12500Hz


14000Hz


16000Hz


18000Hz


20000Hz

columns.name: SOUND_THRESHOLD
columns.description: The lowest decibel at which the patient was able to hear the sound that was played during an Audiometry exam.

columns.name: NO_RESPONSE_YN
columns.description:
Whether or not the patient is able to hear the sound even if played at the highest decibel during an Audiometry exam.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
